verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump 's commitment to the current policy] [V: showed] [ARG1: no sign of faltering] [ARGM-TMP: as voices of outrage and condemnation grew louder and more diverse] .
[ARG1: Trump 's commitment to the current policy] showed no sign of [V: faltering] as voices of outrage and condemnation grew louder and more diverse .
Trump 's commitment to the current policy showed no sign of faltering as [ARG1: voices of outrage and condemnation] [V: grew] [ARG2: louder and more diverse] .
